field.label: Enabled
field.help: Enable this alias for the selected host

field.label: Host override
field.help: Select the associated host override to apply this alias on

field.label: Host
field.help: Name of the host, without the domain part. Use "*" to create a wildcard entry. When left empty, the value defined in the parent override is used.

field.label: Domain
field.help: Domain of the host, e.g. example.com. When left empty, the value defined in the parent override is used.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed)
